data.scheme_name: Madhya Pradesh MSME Development Policy 2021 - Furniture , Toys & Value chain products - Interest Subsidy - Existing
data.benefits:
Interest Subsidy - Interest subvention at the rate of 2% on term loans taken from banks/financial institutions  or the project for 05 years, maximum limit of Rs. 100 lakhs per 
annum.
data.eligibility: MSMEs engaged in manufacturing sector  requires assistance for  diversification & expansion are eligible under this scheme
data.conditions:
1. Manufacturing MSMEs which have started commercial production on or after 01.07.2020 but before the date of notification of this Policy, will be eligible to receive assistance under the earlier relevant policies. 
  2. It is clarified that such units will not be eligible for assistance/facilitation under this Policy.
data.beneficiaries: MSMEs engaged in furniture & toy manufacturing are eligible under this scheme.
data.prerequisites:
1. Manufacturing MSMEs which have started commercial production on or after 01.07.2020 but before the date of notification of this Policy, will be eligible to receive assistance under the earlier relevant policies. 
  2. It is clarified that such units will not be eligible for assistance/facilitation under this Policy.
data.nodal_agency: Department of Micro, Small & Medium Enterprises
data.context:
1. The Micro, Small, and Medium Enterprises (MSME) sector is a key driver of socio-economic growth in India, rapidly emerging as one of the most vibrant and dynamic sectors of the economy. 
  2. MSMEs provide the largest share of employment after the primary sector, addressing one of the countryâ€™s main challenges: employment generation. 
  3. Recognizing the critical role of MSMEs, the Government of Madhya Pradesh (GoMP) prioritizes the development of this sector, acknowledging its importance for sustainable economic growth and job creation.
data.objective: The objective is to create employment opportunities, establish supply chains and infrastructure, attract investment, develop competitive products, and promote service sectors like logistics and packaging in the state.
data.description:
Interest Subsidy - Interest subvention at the rate of 2% on term loans taken from banks/financial institutions  or the project for 05 years, maximum limit of Rs. 100 lakhs per 
annum.
data.how_to_apply:
Industry can Register themselves on the Common portal to avail various services:
https://invest.mp.gov.in/CM/registration
data.funding_facilitator: Madhya Pradesh Industrial Development Co. Ltd., Industries Commissioner, M.P
data.funding_mechanism: Amount will be disbursed to the applicants account after approval of  the Application.
data.additional_info:
1. The unit availing the benefits of this special package will be able to avail other remaining facilities (which are not of the similar type) declared under this policy as per eligibility.
  2. For new manufacturing units, which will start production on or after the date of notification of this Policy, the option of availing facilities/assistances under the earlier incentive schemes will not be available. 
  3. However, the existing MSMEs in the manufacturing sector undertaking expansion/diversification/technological upgradation during the effective period of this Policy will be eligible for assistance/facilities equivalent to a new industrial unit on the additional eligible investment made by them, if the unit remains in the eligible MSME category after such investment.
data.checklist_info_a:
1. Copy of Udyam Registration Certificate 
2. Self-Certified Copy of Partnership Deed / Memorandum and Articles of Association (as applicable) 
3. Self-Certified Copy of land purchase deed (if land is owned by applicant) 
4. PAN Card
5. Detailed Project Report
6. Memorandum of Article (MOA)
7. Balance sheet for Annual Turnover
8. Udyam Registration Certificate
9. Caste certificate(If Applicable)
10. Copy of the invoices, cash bills and stamped receipt duly attested
data.checklist_info_d:
Address: 
3, Udhyog Bhavan BSF Rd Udhyog Kshetra,
Pologround Square, Mari Mata Square, 
Indore, Madhya Pradesh 452003

Contact Details: 07312421109
Email Id: NA
data.beneficiary: Specific Manufacturing Industries - All Entities - Madhya Pradesh - All MSMEs
